relationships.description: Mentioned as getting too friendly with each other, implying a close or intimate relationship.
Implied through their conversation and actions, such as laughing together and sighing in relief when Hermione says she's done well in Arithmancy.
Implied through their conversation, with Harry stopping laughing to avoid annoying her and Hermione coming up behind them.
